page.title: 01Introduction to the Area
page.content: The area is rural with gently rolling fields, and about 200 feet above sea level. {The River Wensum}flows through the area with lush green grassland on either side. A small part of the village of{Great {Ryburgh}occupies the south west corner of the area. The village of{Stibbard is central - a thriving, lively community with a population of about 400. It centres around{The Pound}- a small green with a magnificent beech tree circled in metal with a wooden seat around it. Nearby is the{Post {Office Stores}and the fifty year old {Village Hall}which is the focus of many village activities. Most people from the area work within a few miles of home. Agriculture is very intensive, using large amounts of machinery but few workers.
